string.name: parent
string.value: Humanoid Just Wants to be Human
#p2111003# is the one being that cannot be fully categorized as either a robot, or a human. He apparently has something he desires more than anything else. I better go see #p2111003#.
Once I got him all the materials, #p2111003# gave me a sincere thanks for the work. He seemed so happy... but why does he want to give Phyllia a present? Does he love her...?

Hello, traveler. Have you...seen #b#t4031695##k by any chance? It's snowy white, kind of transparent rose... with a gorgeous scent. I really want to give that to #p2111004#... Can you help me make my wish come true?

Then I need #b50 #t4000353#s#k, #b100 #t4000359#s#k and... #b#t4031696##k too. #t4000353# can be found through #r#o3110300##k, #t4000359# through #r#o4110302##k... And #t4031696# through #b#p2020005##k. Thanks in advance...
...If it's too much, then I understand. I guess things like this should be taken care of alone...
Ah.... You brought them all. Thank you so much... Now I need to make #t4031695#...
I believe #p2111004#... will really like #t4031695#. I don't know why, but... I just feel that she'll like it.
I think you forgot what I asked of you. Can you get me 50 #t4000353#s from #r#o3110300##k, 100 #b#t4000359#s from #r#o4110302##k, and #t4031696# from #b#p2020005##k?
